components/products/sidebar:
<nav aria-label="Navigation Product SideBar">
    <!-- BEGIN Side All Categories -->
    {{> components/halothemes/side-all-categories}}
    <!-- END Side All Categories -->

    {{#if shop_by_brand}}
        {{> components/category/side-shop-by-brand}}
    {{/if}}

    <!-- BEGIN Side Top Seller -->
    {{#if products.featured}}
        {{> components/products/sidebar-slider products=products.featured }}
    {{/if}}    
    <!-- END Side Top Seller -->

    <!-- BEGIN Side Custom CMS Block -->
    {{> components/halothemes/side-custom-block}}
    <!-- END Side Custom CMS Block -->
</nav>
components/halothemes/side-all-categorie:
Categories
{{#if categories}}
    {{#each categories}}
  • {{#if children}} {{name}}
      {{#each children}}
    • {{#if children}} {{name}}
        {{#each children}}
      • {{name}}
        • {{/each}}
      {{else}} {{name}} {{/if}}
      • {{/each}}
    {{else}} {{name}} {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
{{/if}}
components/halothemes/side-custom-block:
{{theme_settings.side_custom_block_title}}

{{theme_settings.side_custom_block_content_1}}{{theme_settings.side_custom_block_content_1_1}}{{theme_settings.side_custom_block_content_1_2}}

{{theme_settings.side_custom_block_content_2}}{{theme_settings.side_custom_block_content_2_1}}
components/category/side-shop-by-brand:
{{lang 'brand.label'}}
    {{#each shop_by_brand}}
  • {{name}}
    • {{/each}}
  • View All Brands
components/products/side-carousel:
{{#each products}}
{{> components/products/card-sidebar theme_settings=../theme_settings customer=../customer}}
{{/each}}
